div.div: Springfield College vs. Western New England
at Springfield, Mass. | Golden Bear Stadium

tr.td: WNE wins toss, receives; Springfield defends South goal for kickoff
PENALTY SPR delay of game (Tyler Rouse) 5 yards to the SPR30.
